expo.name: Color Fashion Wheel
expo.description: Transform your fashion sense with AI-powered color analysis. Extract colors from photos, create stunning color collages, discover perfect outfit combinations, and share your style inspiration with our interactive color wheel technology.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture colors from your clothing and surroundings for color matching.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to extract colors from your existing photos for color analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves your color collages and fashion inspiration images to your photo library for easy access and sharing.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone access is not used by this app.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Fashion Color Wheel to access your camera to capture colors from clothing and surroundings.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Fashion Color Wheel to access your photos to extract colors for analysis.
